traits.Shadowstep: As a bonus action, the gloomstalker can teleport up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the gloomstalker has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The gloomstalker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.Snatch: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17+1d6 + 14). While grappled in this way, the target is restrained.
actions.Shriek (Recharge 6): The gloomstalker emits a terrible shriek. Each enemy within 60 feet of the gloomstalker that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of the enemy's next turn.
